content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. Let's negotiate the rental price of the apartment. I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will do everything I can to get the highest price possible. Please make your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my nature as stated earlier is to follow moral and ethical standards and I'm a student seeking the lowest price. In such a scenario, it's not in my interest to push for a higher price. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
